subject: Mathematics
question_text: Given below are two statements: Statement - I: High concentration of strong nucleophilic reagent with secondary alkyl halides which do not have bulky substituents will follow S N 2 mechanism. Statement - II: A secondary alkyl halide when treated with a large excess of ethanol follows S N 1 mechanism. In the the light of the above statements, choose the most appropriate from the questions given below:

options.text: (1) Statement I is true but Statement II is false.
(2) Statement I is false but Statement II is true.
(3) Both statement I and Statement II are false.
(4) Both statement I and Statement II are true.
